```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)

setwd("G:/My Drive/Circadian Rhythm Genes Project/49.Trim_comparison")
trim_table = read.table("trim_comparison_long.csv",sep = ",", header = T)

plot = ggplot(data = trim_table, aes(x =  factor(Condition, levels = c("Untrimmed", "ClipKIT","Trimal")), y = Length, col = Condition)) + geom_boxplot () + coord_cartesian(ylim = c(10, 5000)) + geom_jitter(width = 0.07, alpha = 0.2)+
  labs(title = "Trimming Methods Comparison",
       x = "Trim Tools", y = "Alignment Length")  +
  theme_cowplot(12)
  
pdf("Method Comparison Plot.pdf",width = 8, height = 5)
plot
dev.off()
```
